sample_docs: What information do we collect? We collect information from you when you register on our site, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, respond to a survey or fill out a form. When ordering or registering on our site, as appropriate, you may be asked to enter your: name, e-mail address, mailing address, phone number or credit card information. You may, however, visit our site anonymously. What do we use your information for? Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one of the following ways: To personalize your experience (your information helps us to better respond to your individual needs) To improve customer service(your information helps us to more effectively respond to your customer service requests and support needs) To process transactions: Your information, whether public or private, will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company for any reason whatsoever, without your consent, other than for the express purpose of delivering the purchased product or service requested. To send periodic emails: The email address you provide for order processing, will only be used to send you information and updates pertaining to your order. To personalize your experience (your information helps us to better respond to your individual needs) To improve customer service(your information helps us to more effectively respond to your customer service requests and support needs) To process transactions: Your information, whether public or private, will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company for any reason whatsoever, without your consent, other than for the express purpose of delivering the purchased product or service requested. To send periodic emails: The email address you provide for order processing, will only be used to send you information and updates pertaining to your order. How do we protect your information? We offer the use of a secure server. All supplied sensitive/credit information is transmitted via Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology and then encrypted into our Payment gateway providers database only to be accessible by those authorized with special access rights to such systems, and are required to keep the information confidential. After a transaction, your private information (credit cards, social security numbers, financials, etc.) will not be stored on our servers. Do we use cookies? Yes (Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computers hard drive through your Web browser (if you allow) that enables the sites or service providers systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information We use cookies to understand and save your preferences for future visits, keep track of advertisements and compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future. Do we disclose any information to outside parties? We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety. However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other Childrens Online Privacy Protection Act Compliance We are in compliance with the requirements of COPPA (Childrens Online Privacy Protection Act), we do not collect any information from anyone under 13 years of age. Our website, products and services are all directed to people who are at least 13 years old or older. Online Only This online applies only to information collected through our website and not to information collected offline. Please also visit our section establishing the use, disclaimers, and limitations of liability governing the use of our website at http://www.ux-labs.com/ .php By using our site, you consent to our websites . Changes to our If we decide to change our , we will update the modification date below. User Interface Developer - Hyderabad, India We are looking for full time User Interface Developer for our Hyderabad, India office, If interested, please contact us, along with the links to your portfolio of work at careers@ux-labs.com Recognizing that employees are at the core of our success, UXLabs recruits and retains highly qualified and motivated individuals, creates an environment where they can innovate and achieve their best, and rewards them for their performance by giving them an opportunity to share in the company's success. UXLabs is seeking User Interface Developer who will be responsible for developing great experiences for several members of the UXLabs product family. You will work collaboratively with fellow members of the User Interface and Engineering team to prototype and develop award winning products; . As a User Interface team member, you would: Design and develop user interface prototypes. Work with Marketing to develop and administer user experience research, and provide analyses and recommendations from participant's handson testing Convert marketing requirements into actionable items that can be implemented in a user interface Design and implement web-based user interfaces Work with User Research and Product Manager to translate business and marketing goals into the best software solutions for our business Design and develop user interface prototypes. Work with Marketing to develop and administer user experience research, and provide analyses and recommendations from participant's handson testing Work with other groups in Engineering and Operations to develop and deploy web-based user interfaces as a productized component of server- and cloud-based applications Participate in all phases of the software development cycle Minimum 5 years of experience in designing and developing web-based user interfaces. Strong foundation in usability, accessibility and ergonomics of UI design, including Section 508 compliance. Working knowledge of PHP and MySQL, and Ajax implementations. Strong background and hands-on experience in developing with JavaScript, Flash, XML, HTML and CSS Exceptional observation and listening skills; ability to recognize user experience needs and convert into product design. Experience creating Apple iPhone applications Experience with web-based UI design We believe that no organization will be successful, without "Satisfied Employee Base", because they are the one who makes the organization. We at UXLabs strive to keep our employees happy and satisfied and provide them a competitive and challenging enviornment. Product Design (UX/UI) UX Labs is a product design company. We guide our clients through the design process, from initial research to creating user personas, conducting usability testing, and launching their products into the market. Usability Testing Usability Testing is a proven method of studying a user's behavior through research and observation while using your product. Through this process, our team of researchers will identify how your users interact with your product or interface to discover any usability issues that might hinder the user in their use experiences. UX Audit Quick and smart, our UX Audits are the first step in ensuring your product reaches its potential. We check UX's pulse by evaluating your application and providing feedback for improvement. UX Strategy & Research UX strategy & research is a critical part of the design process of your product; this is what answers the questions that matter most. At UX Labs, we help you refine the purpose and goals of your product or service using real user insights, so you can focus on what really matters to your users. Design Systems Consistency, efficiency, and scalability are essential for creating exceptional user experiences. Our Design Systems service provides a comprehensive framework that integrates all your design components, guidelines, and best practices into a cohesive and reusable system. By standardizing your design process, we help you maintain brand consistency, streamline collaboration across teams, and accelerate the development of your product or service. Service Models How we collaborate with our clients We regularly reinnovate our service models to ensure you always have the best possible options. UX Design Subscription Model (retainer) Flat fee low commitment model designed to deliver high flexibility. No more worry about change requests, scope creeps, and agile workflows. Flat Rate / Pay-As-You-Go Flexible Plan 30 Day Low Commitment The Project Model Our Project Model offers a clear, defined scope and timeline for dependable and focused results. Pay-Per-Deliverable Fixed Plan Startup Model So, you're a startup! You're looking for your UX Design arm while optimizing your early expenses - we've been there ðŸ˜‰ Let's get to know each other and see how might we partner up! Talk to us! Highly Reduced Rates Top-Tier Digital Product Design Partners UX As Competitive Edge We are a team of designers & researchers who will help you craft every little piece of your product. In the rapidly evolving realm of digital innovation, UX Labs stands out as a pioneering UX/UI agency in Saudi Arabia. Our unwavering commitment to user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design has established us as industry leaders. We present ten compelling reasons that solidify our esteemed position in the field and to clarify what it takes to be a top ux/ui company in Saudi Arabia. 1. Our Dedicated Specialization in UX Our decision to specialize exclusively in UX has set a benchmark in the Saudi digital landscape. This focus has allowed us to delve deeply into user-centric design, going beyond superficial aesthetics to understand and solve complex user needs. Our specialization means that every client we partner with benefits from a rich reservoir of focused expertise, setting us apart in a market often dominated by generalist approaches. Learn About Our Services 2. Endorsement by Global Industry Authorities Being recognized by Clutch as the Top UX/UI Company in Saudi Arabia is a distinction that speaks volumes. Clutch | 2022 B2B Leaders This acknowledgment from a leading global rating platform is a testament to our quality, reliability, and innovation in the UX/UI domain. Such global recognition not only honors our past achievements but also reinforces our commitment to maintaining high standards in our future endeavors. 3. Our Experts At UX Labs, we pride ourselves on our team of experts, each possessing extensive knowledge in their specialized field. Our array includes interaction designers, UX researchers, visual designers, and senior UX leads and managers. This spectrum of specialization ensures that every project benefits from a comprehensive and tailored approach. In this environment, our team's synergy drives the generation of innovative ideas, as diverse expert insights form groundbreaking solutions. 4. Recognized by Prominent Brands The trust placed in us by leading brands in both the Saudi and international markets underscores our ability to deliver solutions that resonate on multiple levels. Our portfolio, which includes collaborations with both private and government sectors, reflects our versatility and capability to adapt to various client needs and industry demands. This widespread recognition is a cornerstone of our reputation as a premier UX/UI agency. 5. Our Profound Experience in Local UX Challenges Our 50,000+ work hours in tackling Saudi-specific UX challenges have endowed us with an intimate understanding of the local market. This extensive experience allows us to craft solutions that are not only culturally relevant and intuitive but also effective in enhancing user engagement and satisfaction. Our deep dive into local preferences and behaviors enables us to create uniquely tailored experiences that resonate with the Saudi audience. About Our Expertise in Saudi Arabia 6. Our Scientifically Grounded Methodology We pride ourselves on a scientific approach to UX/UI design, blending creative intuition with empirical evidence and strategic thinking. This methodology ensures that our designs are not only aesthetically pleasing but also robust and user-friendly. By grounding our work in research and data, we ensure that our solutions are both innovative and effective, catering to the precise needs of our clients and their users. 7. Our Commitment to Innovative, User-Centered De novation is the heartbeat of our design philosophy. Our dedication to creating user-centric designs is evident in every project we undertake. We strive to craft experiences that are not only visually compelling but also intuitive and easy to navigate. Our focus on enhancing the user experience ensures that each interaction with our designs is seamless, enjoyable, and memorable. 8. Balancing Local Relevance with Global Trends Our approach to design is a thoughtful blend of local cultural insights and global design trends. This unique blend ensures that our solutions are not only globally competent but also deeply resonant with local audiences. We excel in harmonizing cultural factors with universal design principles, creating UX/UI solutions that are both relevant and forward-thinking. Our expertise extends to integrating well-established UX standards such as the Saudi Digital Government Authority (DGA) guidelines, principles from the Nielsen Norman Group (NN/g), ISO standards, and more. DGA | Saudi Digital Government Authority By aligning our work with these recognized standards, we ensure that our designs meet the highest levels of quality and efficacy. The Saudi DGA's guidelines help us tailor our solutions to meet the specific needs and cultural context of the Saudi market â€“ within the governmental sectoral more specifically, ensuring local relevance and compliance. Simultaneously, adhering to global benchmarks set by NN/g and ISO allows us to maintain an international standard of UX design excellence. This adherence not only enhances the usability and accessibility of our designs but also ensures they are robust and user-friendly. 9. Diversity and Inclusivity in Our Design We believe that good design is inclusive design. Our commitment to creating solutions that cater to a diverse user base is at the forefront of our design process. We prioritize accessibility and usability, ensuring that our designs are not only aesthetically pleasing but also functional and accessible for all users, regardless of their background or abilities. 10. Our Emphasis on Continuous Advancement In the dynamic field of digital design, staying at the forefront of industry trends and technologies is crucial. Our team at UX Labs is perpetually engaged in learning and adapting to new developments, ensuring that our work consistently reflects the cutting edge of UX/UI design. This commitment to continuous advancement not only sets new standards in the field but also expands the possibilities within digital user experiences. Equally important is our understanding of the varied needs and readiness levels of our clients when it comes to embracing UX design. We excel in crafting solutions that are tailored to each client's specific situation. NN /g | Stages of UX Maturity For companies newly exploring the UX landscape, we offer streamlined and effective strategies that provide a solid introduction to the benefits of user-centered design without necessitating a heavy initial investment. This approach allows these clients to experience the value of UX de a manner that is manageable and impactful for their business stage. Conversely, for clients who are well-versed in digital trends and seek more sophisticated UX solutions, our team is prepared to deliver complex, comprehensive strategies. These advanced solutions are designed to meet high expectations and leverage the full extent of our UX expertise, aligning with a greater level of investment in user experience design. This tailored approach ensures that every client, regardless of their current engagement with UX design, can access and benefit from our expertise. We pride ourselves on being a versatile and adaptable partner, capable of meeting diverse client needs with precision and care. Conclusion These ten reasons collectively underscore our position as a top UX/UI company in Saudi Arabia. Our focused specialization, internationally recognized expertise, and commitment to innovation and quality make us an indispensable partner for any brand looking to elevate its digital presence.
